item.description:
In addition to knitting the guage swatch you should also check your gauge while you are knitting. After you have knit about 12", get out the ruler and see how you're doing. Hold your knitting up vertically because the sttiches hang the way they will eventurally be worn. If the gauge isn't working at 12", you won't have that much to frog.

This fiber fact and many more to come.

Also we have a knit night coming up.
item.name: Getting Gauge - Wednesday July 8th
